articles.author: Press Association
articles.title: European Union backs new sanctions against Russia, including on coal imports - TheJournal.ie
articles.description: The deal was given the final political go-ahead in a meeting of EU ambassadors and will be enacted once published in the EU’s official journal.
articles.content:
EUROPEAN UNION COUNTRIES have approved new sanctions against Russia, including an EU embargo on coal imports in the wake of evidence of torture and killings emerging from war zones outside Kyiv.
